title: Experienced Silver II 3v3 Player LF Team
body:
Hey guys, my name is SlimeMaster6000. I am currently an active member on two 3v3 teams ranked Silver II, and I want to find an active team who is serious about getting gold. 

What I play in Twisted Treeline:

* AD Bruiser top (preferred role)
* ADC and wave-clear AP mages bot
* Jungle anything (I main jungle on SR)

Feel free to leave a comment below if you would like to add me, or just friend me in Client: SlimeMaster6000.

replies.body: Please add me im extremely interested
Im looking to make a team like that to reach gold!
